name: Lost in the Rain
description:
It is said that children who, on a rainy night, get lost in the city, end up devoured by the sirains. The only way to escape those starving creatures is to find other lost children and stay close to them.

It is also said that the sirains always find a way to seep into the most solid groups. By using evil thoughts, fear, hunger and loneliness, they lure their victims out before they snatch them, one by one, and devour them in the dark.

In the end, only one lost child will find the way home.

The others will never be seen again.

Lost in the rain is a short roleplaying game of sadness and horror which invites you to take on the role of a child, lost in the great city and hunted by ravenous creatures.
